part_description: Two sockets and three switches, evenly arranged on face.
internal_interaction_description: Switches control power flow to respective sockets, allowing independent operation. Each socket can be activated or deactivated by its corresponding switch, providing flexibility in usage.
external_interaction_description: Connects to electrical devices via plugs, supplying power. Users interact by plugging in devices and toggling switches to control power supply, facilitating energy management and device operation.
